etomica.graphics

Class DisplayTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.Display
      • etomica.graphics.DisplayTextBox
        • etomica.graphics.DisplayTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSink, GraphicalElement, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

    public class DisplayTimer
extends DisplayTextBox
    DisplayBox to present the elapsed time in a molecular dynamics simulation. Designed for use with a single integrator.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpdateInterval

        public void setUpdateInterval(int interval)
        Sets the period for updating the display. Number of integrator interval events between updates. Does not have any effect on the value displayed; affects only how often it is updated.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Unhooks the DisplayTimer from the integrator

      • getTimer

        public DataSourceCountTime getTimer()
        Returns the data source used to count the time, to permit access to its methods for reset, etc.
        Returns:
